article_title: House panel OKs lower fee to fund HealthSource RI
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: After months of uncertainty over the future of HealthSource RI — during which legislation surfaced that would have actually killed it — the Rhode Island House of Representatives has signaled that it is moving to keep the doors of the exchange open so it can continue serving as a local marketplace for subsidized Obamacare health plans.One of the key sticking points has always been how to pay for the state-based exchange. On Tuesday, the House Finance Committee backed Governor
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
